import sys

# Read the input
d, t, s = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split(' '))

if d / s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

"""
D = int(input())  # distance
T = int(input())  # time
S = int(input())  # speed

if D / S <= T:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
"""

# これでもOK
"""
D, T, S = map(int, input().split())
print("Yes" if D / S <= T else "No")
"""

# これでもOK
"""
D, T, S = map(int, input().split())
print(["No", "Yes"][D / S <= T])
"""

# Read input
D, T, S = map(int, input().split())

# Calculate time
time = D / S

# Check if he will arrive in time
if time <= T:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

# get input from user
D, T, S = map(int, input().split())

# calculate time needed to arrive at the place
time_needed = D / S

# check if he can arrive in time
if time_needed <= T:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
